agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides a crisis hotline for pregnant women and parents with crisis pregnancy situations such as information and referral, includes connecting parents to resources to prevent newborn abandonment.
service_description: Provides a crisis hotline for mothers, fathers and parents who are experiencing a crisis during pregnancy. Support is offered by information and referral, safe surrender locations, adoption resources, and parenting support. Also provides direction to resources to assist and prevent infant abandonment.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_eligibility: Pregnant Mother -- Father -- Parents in crisis

agency_desc: Provides a support group for parents, spouses, families, and friends of a loved one experiencing drug or alcohol addiction.
site_name: PARENTS OF ADDICTED LOVED ONES - HEADQUARTERS
service_name: PARENTS OF ADDICTED LOVED ONES SUPPORT GROUP
service_description: Offers support groups to the relatives and friends of loved ones with an alcohol or drug addiction.
taxonomy_name: Families/Friends of Individuals With an Alcohol Use Disorder Support Groups
nameLevel5: Families/Friends of Individuals With an Alcohol Use Disorder Support Groups
site_details: Visit the website to find a support group within your area. -- Walk in. -- Call or send email for information.
site_eligibility: Age 18 or older -- Relatives and friends of people with an alcohol or drug addiction
